lead_paragraph: The Carolina Panthers and Denver Broncos gathered at Levi's Stadium for team pictures on Saturday after proclaiming themselves fit and raring to go for Super Bowl 50.

headline.print_headline: Teams Fit, Raring to Go for Super Bowl 50
headline.main: Teams Fit, Raring to Go for Super Bowl 50
